t: Big Heart Pet Brands - Pack of Pets
s: January 29, 2018 - The Big Heart Pet Brands founded on January 28, 2014, by The J.M Smucker Company is a producer, distributor, and marketer of branded pet foods. The Big Heart Pet Brand was previously a pet food division of Del Monte Foods before their 2014 sale of Del Monte Pacific.

t: Big Heart Pet Brands (f/k/a Del Monte) - Vestar Capital Partners
s: July 7, 2021 - Big Heart Pet Brands is a producer, distributor and marketer of branded pet products for the U.S. retail market. Big Heart Pet Brands has some of the strongest brands in the pet food and pet snacks business, including Meow Mix, Kibbles ‘n Bits, Milk-Bone and 9Lives.
